subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After homering twice in the opener, Jacoby Ellsbury’s three-run shot in the nightcap of a doubleheader pushed Boston past the Yankees and may have helped save the Red Sox’ season.
snippet: After homering twice in the opener, Jacoby Ellsbury’s three-run shot in the nightcap of a doubleheader pushed Boston past the Yankees and may have helped save the Red Sox’ season.
